front.title: Abstract", Hongjie Wu, Jian Chen, Xiaotian Fan, Zhiping Li,

abstract.t: This document describes the Data Escrow report requirement and technical details of the interfaces provides by the Top-level Node (TLN) to its contracted parties. Second-level Node (SLN) MUST periodically send data escrow report to Top-level Node (TLN) and Data Escrow Agent (DEA). DEA MUST sends report verify result to TLN and SLN after processing the report.
